Package com.facetec.sdk

Class FaceTecSDK

java.lang.Object
com.facetec.sdk.FaceTecSDK
public final class FaceTecSDK extends Object
FaceTecSDK is the main class you will use in controlling FaceTec SDK.
This class consists of static methods that will aid in setting up FaceTec SDK for
verification as well as give some insight as to the capabilities
of the device which will help in setting up verification strategies.

  • Method Details

    • initializeWithSessionRequest

      public static void initializeWithSessionRequest(@NonNull android.content.Context context, @NonNull String deviceKeyIdentifier, @NonNull FaceTecSessionRequestProcessor sessionRequestProcessor, @NonNull FaceTecSDK.InitializeCallback callback)
      Initializes the FaceTec SDK with a session request
      Parameters:
      context - Activity context
      deviceKeyIdentifier - Identifies the client for determination of key capabilities
      sessionRequestProcessor - An implementation of FaceTecSessionRequestProcessor used to send initial request to the FaceTec Server.
      callback - Callback to notify caller when initialization has completed

    • deinitialize

      public static void deinitialize()
      Release resources related to FaceTec SDK. Initialize _must_ be called again by the application before invoking any SDK operations. This function may be called repeatedly without harm.

    • setLowLightCustomization

      public static void setLowLightCustomization(FaceTecCustomization lowLightCustomization)

    • getLockoutEndTime

      @Nullable public static Long getLockoutEndTime(android.content.Context context)
      Convenience method to get the time when a lockout will end. This will be null if the user is not locked out
      Parameters:
      context - Activity context
      Returns:
      The timestamp of when the current timestamp will end or null if not currently locked out

    • isLockedOut

      public static boolean isLockedOut(android.content.Context context)
      True if the user is locked out of FaceTec SDK.
      Parameters:
      context - Activity context
      Returns:
      TRUE if currently locked out

    • preload

      public static void preload(android.content.Context context)
      Load FaceTec SDK resources in the background even if initialize() has not been called yet.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context

    • getCameraPermissionStatus

      public static FaceTecSDK.CameraPermissionStatus getCameraPermissionStatus(android.content.Context context)
      Convenience method to check for android camera permissions. This function is used to check the camera permission status prior to using FaceTec SDK. If camera permission has not been previously granted, FaceTec will display a UI requesting the user to allow permission, however some applications may wish to manage camera permission themselves. Those applications should verify camera permissions prior to transitioning.
      Parameters:
      context - Activity context
      Returns:
      FaceTecSDK.CameraPermissionStatus

    • version

      public static String version()
      Fetches the version number of the current FaceTec SDK release.
      Returns:
      version number of sdk release package

    • setDynamicStrings

      public static void setDynamicStrings(Map<Integer,String> strings)
      Method to set dynamic overrides of the SDK's customizable string resources.
      Parameters:
      strings - A map object mapping a String resource id (e.g. R.string.FaceTec_action_ok) to a String value.

    • configureOCRLocalization

      public static void configureOCRLocalization(org.json.JSONObject ocrLocalizationJSON)
      Configure the custom localized strings to be used for groups, fields, and placeholder text on ID Scan's User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Parameters:
      ocrLocalizationJSON - Optional JSONObject created from a JSON that follows our template file of configurable groups, fields, and placeholder texts: "FaceTec_OCR_Customization.json". By default, this is null and the strings used will be our internal defaults.

    • getTestingAPIHeader

      public static String getTestingAPIHeader()
      Method needed only by the FaceTec Sample App when communicating with the Testing API
      Returns:
      A header string

    • getActivitySessionResult

      @Nullable public static FaceTecSessionResult getActivitySessionResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, android.content.Intent data)
      Retrieves a FaceTecSessionResult instance related to an Activity result
      Parameters:
      requestCode - The value from onActivityResult()
      resultCode - The value from onActivityResult()
      data - The value from onActivityResult()
      Returns:
      A FaceTecSessionResult instance
